devdoc.details: A smart contract that holds donations in escrow and releases funds to an NGO based on verifiable proof of milestone completion by a designated Oracle. Donors receive a conceptual "Proof-of-Impact" NFT (tracked by a simple counter).

getAllMilestones(uint256).details: Get all milestones for a campaign

getCampaignInfo(uint256).details: Get campaign details (without milestones array which can't be returned directly)

devdoc.title: ProofOfImpact
